text:
Paradise Classic (Punggol Coast Mall): Delicious Food and Excellent Service in a Charming Setting (5/5 Stars)

Rating Breakdown:

• Food Quality: 5/5 (Delicious hor fun with "wok hei," excellent ebiko fried rice)

• Service: 5/5 (Top-notch service)

• Value: 4/5 (Slightly pricier than average, but justified by quality)

• Ambiance: 5/5 (Warm and inviting, blending modern comfort with traditional Singaporean aesthetics)

Overall: 5/5 Stars

Paradise Classic at Punggol Coast Mall exceeded expectations! Donkey & I, initially planned to dine at Aston due to a promotional offer, the long queue steered us towards Paradise Classic, and we're so glad it did. We ordered a delightful selection: Carlsberg beer, crispy prawn rolls, braised prawn broth hor fun, and prawn-infused ebiko fried rice. The hor fun was a standout, boasting a delicious "wok hei" flavour that I thoroughly enjoyed. Donkey's fried rice was also a hit, particularly when mixed with the provided sambal belacan chili. The overall dining experience was enhanced by the top-notch service provided by the restaurant staff.

The ambiance at Paradise Classic is warm and inviting, with a design that blends modern comfort with a nod to traditional Singaporean aesthetics. The restaurant's décor incorporates nostalgic imagery of old Singapore, creating a charming and familiar atmosphere. Comfortable seating adds to the overall pleasant dining experience. It's a nice balance of modern and traditional, making it suitable for a wide range of diners.

While slightly pricier than average, the quality of the food and service at Paradise Classic makes it a worthwhile dining destination. Highly recommended!

Food is good. The captains are also very accomodating in helping us shift tables at our request because of our infant.

Servers are also responsive and the time taken for each dish to be serve is quick and efficient. Overall, a pleasant experience.
Delicious nanyang food plus friendly staff that made dinning wonderful (dessert is super).
Just open! Good price for individual dishes. Nice decorations. Friendly staff
Great service! Good taste good and was lucky to have not waited long. Will come again!
